Text:
wow. I must admit, this was not something that I ever expected to see on here. Talk about a flashback. If I remember correctly, I really enjoyed this 1st one. I think it went downhill from there......
Anyways, I have just recently created an account, but for quite some time now, I have had the TvTeam page bookmarked. Your main page is always the first place I look, and usually, I have to look no further.

I have never been disappointed with TvTeam, and I just wanted to officially express my gratitude. Thank you.
